entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Esther
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:04 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esther 10:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -25.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
